scripts.eas-build-pre-install: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const cand=['node_modules/react-native/node_modules/@react-native/gradle-plugin/react-native-gradle-plugin/build.gradle.kts','node_modules/@react-native/gradle-plugin/react-native-gradle-plugin/build.gradle.kts'];let ok=0;for(const rel of cand){const f=p.join(process.cwd(),rel);if(fs.existsSync(f)){let s=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');const before=s;s=s.replace(/import\s+org\.gradle\.configurationcache\.extensions\.serviceOf\s*\r?\n/g,'');s=s.replace(/import\s+org\.gradle\.kotlin\.dsl\.support\.serviceOf\s*\r?\n/g,'');s=s.replace(/(^|[\s(=])serviceOf</g,'$1gradle.serviceOf<');if(s!==before){fs.writeFileSync(f,s,'utf8');console.log('[patch] patched:',rel);ok++;}else{console.log('[patch] no changes:',rel);}}}if(!ok)console.log('[patch] plugin file not found; continuing');"
